comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: George J. Meyer, postmaster of Buffalo, politician and Brewery owner, he died on July 13, 1916 (buffaloah.com/a/north/249/hist/source/2.html, The sun., July 14, 1919, Page 7, col. 6). In 1916, he was Chairman of the Erie County Democratic Committee (NYT Feb. 21, 1916 query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F40916F83B5B17...) Another photo of him is in buffaloah.com/a/north/249/hist/source/7.html

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: B-59:  Thanks for providing more info on Meyer here.  We will include some of it next time we update.
